metadata.title: BigBWA: Approaching the Burrows-Wheeler aligner to Big Data technologies
metadata.abstract: © The Author 2015. Published by Oxford University Press. All rights reserved. BigBWA is a new tool that uses the Big Data technology Hadoop to boost the performance of the Burrows-Wheeler aligner (BWA). Important reductions in the execution times were observed when using this tool. In addition, BigBWA is fault tolerant and it does not require any modification of the original BWA source code.

description: Tool to run the Burrows-Wheeler Aligner-BWA on a Hadoop cluster. It supports the algorithms BWA-MEM, BWA-ALN, and BWA-SW, working with paired and single reads. It implies an important reduction in the computational time when running in a Hadoop cluster, adding scalability and fault-tolerancy.
name: BigBWA
